segments.text: You ’ re working hard , George . What are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m making a bookcase . Give me that hammer please , Dan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , not that one . The big one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you going to do now , George ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m going to paint it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What colour are you going to paint it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m going to paint it pink .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This bookcase isn ’ t for me . It ’ s for my daughter , Susan . Pink ’ s her favorite colour .
segments.speaker: S2
